derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: named after Rudolf von Carnall (1804–74), German mining engineer, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a white or reddish mineral consisting of hydrous chlorides of potassium and magnesium; used as a fertilizer and as a source of potassium and magnesium
